io.github.bluelhf.tasks.Task

      Methods in io.github.bluelhf.tasks that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <P,​R>
      Task<P,​R>      		 Task.of​(Function<Task.Delegate,​R> supplierFunction)
      Creates a new task using the delegate-result function.
      Task<P,​R> Task.onProgress​(BiConsumer<P,​P> progressConsumer)
      Adds a progress listener to this Task.
      Task<P,​R> Task.onResult​(Consumer<R> resultConsumer)
      Adds a result listener to this Task.
      Task<P,​R> Task.whileRunning​(Consumer<P> progressConsumer, Duration period)
      Runs the given Consumer every period as long as the task is running, and once when the task completes.
